name: Latency Interrupt
description:
Latency Interrupt is a 3d pinball machine and energy painting application that muses abstractly on time, lag, distance, and graphical artifacts.

The space between two people, online or in person, is infinite.

Bad communication as Zeno's Arrow.

More a toy than a game, Latency Interrupt was created for a collaborative Twitch streamed performance with deSolid State held at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Jacksonville Florida in Oct of 2021.

**NOTE: Epilepsy warning for Level 4 for unpredictable flashing lights/images.**
